name: Fright Animatronics 2
description:
Welcome to your new job as a night shift security guard in our new warehouse. I think you heard about what happened in one establishment, but now everything is in order. But be careful while on duty. Robots-animatronics stay on at night

    Features:

  • Be careful - danger may be nearby

  • Use a video surveillance system to monitor what is happening in the warehouse

  • Hide if you are noticed

  • Explore the area - you can find something necessary or secret

  • Don't forget about the security room systems - they can break at the most inopportune moment
